question: Hajj before marriage with parents and Hajj after marriage with husband.
answer:
QUESTION
My wife has been to hajj with her parents in her age of maturity. This year insh.all. We wish to go for hajj. Will it be hajje badal for her? if yes, please let me know the priorities for whom it should be done. jazak allah
ANSWER


Share:
It is more virtuous to perform Haj-e-Badl than nafl Haj. If Haj was fardh on
any one parent and he/she did not fulfill the obligation, then Haj-e-Badl
should be performed on his/her behalf.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
